```{r}
# install.packages("kohonen")
library(kohonen)
```

```{r}
data = read.csv('../../../../../bigcontest/data/preprocessed/for_som.csv')
X = data[, 2:14]
```

```{r}
gr <- somgrid(xdim = 3, ydim = 3, topo = "hexagonal")
ss <- supersom(as.matrix(X), gr, rlen = 100, alpha = 0.1)
plot(ss, type="changes")
plot(ss, type="count", main="Node Counts")
plot(ss, type="codes")
```


```{r}
gr2 <- somgrid(xdim = 2, ydim = 2, topo = "hexagonal")
ss2 <- supersom(as.matrix(X), gr2, rlen = 100, alpha = 0.1)
plot(ss2, type="changes")
plot(ss2, type="count", main="Node Counts")
plot(ss2, type="codes")
```
